alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 12:16AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water In The Noatak, Kobuk And Koyukuk Valleys... The northwest Interior received 2 to 5 inches of rainfall over the past week, with the heaviest amounts in the Upper Kobuk, Upper Noatak, and lower Koyukuk Valleys. Expect rivers in the Noatak, Kobuk, and Koyukuk Valleys to remain high this week. Flooding is not expected, but most gravel bars will be covered by water, and logs will float down rivers. More rain possible through tonight east of Ambler could cause issues on small rivers and streams east of Ambler. A strong storm moving in today and Wednesday will bring another inch of rain to most of this area keeping rivers high all week.

area.areaDesc: Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys
